panels.description: Изменение суммы среднего чека покупок за день на текущий момент.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT avg(cost) FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale GROUP BY toDate(timestamp) ORDER BY toDate(timestamp)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT avg(cost) FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale GROUP BY toDate(timestamp) ORDER BY toDate(timestamp)

panels.title: Средний чек

panels.description: График показывает изменение среднего чека по дням.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT toDate(timestamp), avg(cost) FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale GROUP BY toDate(timestamp) ORDER BY toDate(timestamp)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT toDate(timestamp), avg(cost) FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale GROUP BY toDate(timestamp) ORDER BY toDate(timestamp)

panels.title: Изменение среднего чека за день

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT productId, SUM(salesCount) as popularity FROM analytics_metrics.product_dynamic GROUP BY productId ORDER BY popularity DESC
targets.rawQuery: SELECT productId, SUM(salesCount) as popularity FROM analytics_metrics.product_dynamic GROUP BY productId ORDER BY popularity DESC

panels.description: Количество посетителей интернет-магазина за единицу времени (количество запросов в секунду).

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    count()
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    count()
FROM analytics_metrics.attendance

WHERE timestamp >= toDateTime(1619116965) AND timestamp <= toDateTime(1619117424)

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  t, 
  (SELECT count1 FROM (SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    count() as count1 FROM $table WHERE timestamp >= timestamp_sub(SECOND, 11, toDateTime(now())) AND timestamp <= timestamp_sub(SECOND, 10, toDateTime(now())) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t DESC) ORDER BY count1 DESC LIMIT 1 ) - count
FROM (SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() as count FROM $table GROUP BY t ORDER BY t)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 
  t, 
  (SELECT count1 FROM (SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    count() as count1 FROM analytics_metrics.attendance WHERE timestamp >= timestamp_sub(SECOND, 11, toDateTime(now())) AND timestamp <= timestamp_sub(SECOND, 10, toDateTime(now())) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t DESC) ORDER BY count1 DESC LIMIT 1 ) - count
FROM (SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t, count() as count FROM analytics_metrics.attendance GROUP BY t ORDER BY t)

panels.title: Посещаемость интернет-магазина

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 10 second) as time, count() as count FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery: SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 10 second) as time, count() as count FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT date_add(SECOND, 30, time) as t, count FROM (SELECT toDateTime(toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 10 second)) as time, count() as count FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale WHERE time < date_sub(SECOND, 30, toDateTime(now())) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT date_add(SECOND, 30, time) as t, count FROM (SELECT toDateTime(toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 10 second)) as time, count() as count FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale WHERE time < date_sub(SECOND, 30, toDateTime(now())) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
  t, 
  (SELECT count1 FROM (SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    count() as count1 FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale WHERE timestamp >= timestamp_sub(SECOND, 11, toDateTime(now())) AND timestamp <= timestamp_sub(SECOND, 10, toDateTime(now())) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t DESC) ORDER BY count1 DESC LIMIT 1 ) - count
FROM (SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() as count FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale GROUP BY t ORDER BY t)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 
  t, 
  (SELECT count1 FROM (SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    count() as count1 FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale WHERE timestamp >= timestamp_sub(SECOND, 11, toDateTime(now())) AND timestamp <= timestamp_sub(SECOND, 10, toDateTime(now())) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t DESC) ORDER BY count1 DESC LIMIT 1 ) - count
FROM (SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t, count() as count FROM analytics_metrics.dynamic_sale GROUP BY t ORDER BY t)
